### Hi, I'm Matt

I'm a data scientist with a strong foundation in statistical modeling, machine learning, and cloud-based analytics. I earned a B.S. in Data Science from [St. Lawrence University](https://www.stlawu.edu/offices/math-computer-science-and-statistics){target="_blank"} in May 2024, where I focused on applied statistics, advanced modeling, and database systems. Iâ€™m currently completing my M.S. in Data Science at [Boston University](https://www.bu.edu/cds/), with coursework in Bayesian statistics, deep learning, AI ethics, medical science, and financial analytics.

My work spans health analytics, finance, sports, and public data visualization. Highlights include:

- Building real-time Azure pipelines and sentiment models for cryptocurrency analytics  
- Creating Shiny dashboards and Power BI visualizations for public health and sports data  
- Developing predictive models for depression risk using the NHANES survey and clinical data  
- Contributing to a published clinical research article on hemodynamic monitoring in cardiac patients  

Whether regression modeling, cloud infrastructure, or storytelling through dashboards, I love applying data to solve real-world problems with clarity and insight.

As a Research Assistant (Summer 2023), I conducted statistical analysis in RStudio â€” including descriptive statistics and hypothesis testing â€” to examine systolic pressure variations across three arterial sites in cardiac surgery patients. This work contributed to a peer-reviewed research article published in the *Journal of Cardiothoracic and Vascular Anesthesia*.

### Rodeo Sports Analytics: Senior Year Experience

During my Senior Year Experience (SYE) at St. Lawrence University, I developed a public-facing data analytics project published by the SCORE Network. The project analyzes rider and bull performance data from the Professional Bull Riders (PBR) tour, using scraped statistics and custom indicators to explore event structure, athlete outcomes, as well as creating educational material for new data science learners to use.

[View SCORE Network Project](https://data.scorenetwork.org/rodeo_sports/bullriders_n_bulls_pbr_tpd_2023.html){target="_blank"}
